columns.name: api_id
columns.description: The id of the api which contains this stage

columns.name: api_gateway_managed
columns.description: Specifies whether a stage is managed by API Gateway

columns.name: auto_deploy
columns.description: Specifies whether updates to an API automatically trigger a new deployment

columns.name: client_certificate_id
columns.description: The identifier of a client certificate for a Stage. Supported only for WebSocket APIs

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: The timestamp when the stage was created

columns.name: deployment_id
columns.description: The identifier of the Deployment that the Stage is associated with

columns.name: default_route_data_trace_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether (true) or not (false) data trace logging is enabled for this route. This property affects the log entries pushed to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. Supported only for WebSocket APIs

columns.name: default_route_detailed_metrics_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether detailed metrics are enabled

columns.name: default_route_logging_level
columns.description: Specifies the logging level for this route: INFO, ERROR, or OFF. This property affects the log entries pushed to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. Supported only for WebSocket APIs

columns.name: default_route_throttling_burst_limit
columns.description: Throttling burst limit for default route settings

columns.name: default_route_throttling_rate_limit
columns.description: Throttling rate limit for default route settings

columns.name: last_deployment_status_message
columns.description: Describes the status of the last deployment of a stage. Supported only for stages with autoDeploy enabled

columns.name: last_updated_date
columns.description: The timestamp when the stage was last updated

columns.name: access_log_settings
columns.description: Access log settings of the stage.

columns.name: stage_variables
columns.description: A map that defines the stage variables for a stage resource
